title: Carer visa
summary: This page provides comprehensive information about the Carer visa (subclass 116), a permanent visa allowing individuals to move to Australia to provide long-term care for an eligible relative who has no reasonable access to care in Australia. It includes eligibility criteria, costs, processing details, obligations, travel rights, and application requirements.

structured_data.description: This visa allows a person to move to Australia to provide ongoing, substantial care for an Australian relative or a relative’s family member with a long-term medical condition who has no reasonable access to care options in Australia.

important_updates.import_limitations: Some existing applications made outside Australia before 25 June 2020 cannot be imported into ImmiAccount.

post_5_year_travel_requirements: Resident Return Visa (RRV) to re-enter as a permanent resident
Consider Australian citizenship (requires Australian passport for re-entry)

benefits: Travel to and from Australia for 5 years
Attend free English classes under the Adult Migrant English Program (if eligible)

application_requirements.sponsorship: You must be sponsored by your relative or their partner for your first 2 years in Australia.
application_requirements.care_requirements: You must provide ongoing substantial care for an Australian relative or their family member who lives with them and has no reasonable access to care options in Australia.

eligibility.be_a_carer: You must be willing and able to provide ongoing substantial care and support for the person needing care.
eligibility.understand_care_needs: Applicant must understand the sponsor’s medical condition and care requirements.
eligibility.have_a_sponsor: You must be sponsored by an eligible sponsor.
eligibility.location_requirement: Must be outside Australia when applying and when a decision is made.

costs.possible_fee_reductions: Second instalment may be reduced to nil if applicant can show severe financial hardship affecting themselves or the person receiving care. Not applicable to secondary applicants.
costs.visa_pricing_estimator_note: Does not include second instalment or additional costs.

processing_times.general_info: Demand exceeds places available each year; processing can be lengthy.
processing_times.guide_tool: Visa processing time guide tool provides indicative processing times.

obligations.first_entry_requirement: Must enter Australia before the date specified in the grant letter (typically within 12 months of visa grant).
obligations.general_obligations: Must meet all visa conditions and obey Australian laws.

travel.travel_rights: Unlimited travel to and from Australia for 5 years from grant date.
travel.post_5_year_requirement: RRV subclass 155 or 157 required to re-enter as a permanent resident.
travel.visa_label: No physical label; visa is digitally linked to passport.
